sentence.Network_en: Allomorph: any of the different form of a morpheme.
sentence.Network_cn: 语素变体: 语素的任何不同形式.

杂质色的Allogyric Birefringence异旋双折射allomorph同质异晶allomorphism
同一词素在不同的构词环境中可以有不同的变体，叫做词素变体（allomorph）。词素变体可以有不同的读音和拼法，例如自由词素go的变体为went和gone；粘着词素in-的变体为.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several different crystalline forms of the same chemical compound;

sentences.sentence: "calcium carbonate occurs in the allomorphs calcite and aragonite"

means.word_mean: 2. a variant phonological representation of a morpheme;

sentences.sentence: "the final sounds of `bets' and `beds' and `horses' and `oxen' are allomorphs of the English plural morpheme"
